dataTemplate.name: XXSCSASR
dataTemplate.description: OD: SC STR Audit Status Report

dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT OD_SC_VENDOR_NUMBER ,OD_SC_VENDOR_NAME ,OD_SC_VEND_TYPE ,OD_SC_VENDOR_STATUS ,OD_SC_AUDIT_AGENT ,OD_SC_VEND_CONT_NAME ,OD_SC_VEND_PHONE ,OD_SC_VEND_FAX ,OD_SC_VEND_EMAIL ,OD_SC_VEND_ADDRESS ,OD_SC_FACTORY_NUMBER ,OD_SC_FACTORY_NAME ,OD_SC_FACT_CONT_NAME ,OD_SC_FACTORY_EMAIL ,OD_SC_FACTORY_ADDRESS ,OD_SC_FACTORY_PHONE ,OD_SC_FACTORY_FAX ,OD_SC_EUROPE_RGN ,OD_SC_EU_SUB_RGN ,OD_SC_EU_VEND_STATUS ,OD_SC_MEXICO_REGION ,OD_SC_MX_VEND_NO ,OD_SC_MEX_FACTORY_NO ,OD_SC_MX_VEND_STATUS ,OD_SC_ASIA_REGION ,OD_SC_AS_SUB_RGN ,OD_SC_AS_VEND_NO ,OD_SC_AS_VEND_STATUS ,OD_SC_MERCHANT ,OD_SC_AUDIT_REQUIRED ,OD_SC_AUDIT_WAIVER ,OD_SC_VEND_REGION ,OD_SC_CIP ,OD_SC_FOB_VALUE ,OD_SC_STRAUDT_REQ_D ,OD_SC_PAYMENT_RETAINER ,OD_SC_STR_PAYMENT_APPROVER ,OD_SC_VENDPAY_RCVD_D ,OD_SC_STRAUDT_SCHD_D ,OD_SC_REQ_AUDIT_DATE ,OD_SC_STR_AUDIT_RESULT ,OD_PB_PAYRTN_APRVL_DATE ,OD_SC_SHARED_FACTORY ,OD_SC_EU_VEND_NO ,OD_SC_EU_FACTORY_NO ,OD_SC_EU_VEND_STATUS FROM Q_od_pb_sc_vendor_master_v WHERE 1=1 AND OD_SC_VENDOR_STATUS = 'Active' AND ('ODUS' = :P_REGION OR :P_REGION = 'ODGLB') AND OD_SC_AUDTWAIV_APR_D IS NULL UNION SELECT OD_SC_VENDOR_NUMBER ,OD_SC_VENDOR_NAME ,OD_SC_VEND_TYPE ,OD_SC_VENDOR_STATUS ,OD_SC_AUDIT_AGENT ,OD_SC_VEND_CONT_NAME ,OD_SC_VEND_PHONE ,OD_SC_VEND_FAX ,OD_SC_VEND_EMAIL ,OD_SC_VEND_ADDRESS ,OD_SC_FACTORY_NUMBER ,OD_SC_FACTORY_NAME ,OD_SC_FACT_CONT_NAME ,OD_SC_FACTORY_EMAIL ,OD_SC_FACTORY_ADDRESS ,OD_SC_FACTORY_PHONE ,OD_SC_FACTORY_FAX ,OD_SC_EUROPE_RGN ,OD_SC_EU_SUB_RGN ,OD_SC_EU_VEND_STATUS ,OD_SC_MEXICO_REGION ,OD_SC_MX_VEND_NO ,OD_SC_MEX_FACTORY_NO ,OD_SC_MX_VEND_STATUS ,OD_SC_ASIA_REGION ,OD_SC_AS_SUB_RGN ,OD_SC_AS_VEND_NO ,OD_SC_AS_VEND_STATUS ,OD_SC_MERCHANT ,OD_SC_AUDIT_REQUIRED ,OD_SC_AUDIT_WAIVER ,OD_SC_VEND_REGION ,OD_SC_CIP ,OD_SC_FOB_VALUE ,OD_SC_STRAUDT_REQ_D ,OD_SC_PAYMENT_RETAINER ,OD_SC_STR_PAYMENT_APPROVER ,OD_SC_VENDPAY_RCVD_D ,OD_SC_STRAUDT_SCHD_D ,OD_SC_REQ_AUDIT_DATE ,OD_SC_STR_AUDIT_RESULT ,OD_PB_PAYRTN_APRVL_DATE ,OD_SC_SHARED_FACTORY ,OD_SC_EU_VEND_NO ,OD_SC_EU_FACTORY_NO ,OD_SC_EU_VEND_STATUS FROM Q_od_sc_eu_vendor_master_v WHERE 1=1 AND OD_SC_VENDOR_STATUS = 'Active' AND ('ODEU' = :P_REGION OR :P_REGION = 'ODGLB') AND OD_SC_AUDTWAIV_APR_D IS NULL UNION SELECT OD_SC_VENDOR_NUMBER ,OD_SC_VENDOR_NAME ,OD_SC_VEND_TYPE ,OD_SC_VENDOR_STATUS ,OD_SC_AUDIT_AGENT ,OD_SC_VEND_CONT_NAME ,OD_SC_VEND_PHONE ,OD_SC_VEND_FAX ,OD_SC_VEND_EMAIL ,OD_SC_VEND_ADDRESS ,OD_SC_FACTORY_NUMBER ,OD_SC_FACTORY_NAME ,OD_SC_FACT_CONT_NAME ,OD_SC_FACTORY_EMAIL ,OD_SC_FACTORY_ADDRESS ,OD_SC_FACTORY_PHONE ,OD_SC_FACTORY_FAX ,OD_SC_EUROPE_RGN ,OD_SC_EU_SUB_RGN ,OD_SC_EU_VEND_STATUS ,OD_SC_MEXICO_REGION ,OD_SC_MX_VEND_NO ,OD_SC_MEX_FACTORY_NO ,OD_SC_MX_VEND_STATUS ,OD_SC_ASIA_REGION ,OD_SC_AS_SUB_RGN ,OD_SC_AS_VEND_NO ,OD_SC_AS_VEND_STATUS ,OD_SC_MERCHANT ,OD_SC_AUDIT_REQUIRED ,OD_SC_AUDIT_WAIVER ,OD_SC_VEND_REGION ,OD_SC_CIP ,OD_SC_FOB_VALUE ,OD_SC_STRAUDT_REQ_D ,OD_SC_PAYMENT_RETAINER ,OD_SC_STR_PAYMENT_APPROVER ,OD_SC_VENDPAY_RCVD_D ,OD_SC_STRAUDT_SCHD_D ,OD_SC_REQ_AUDIT_DATE ,OD_SC_STR_AUDIT_RESULT ,OD_PB_PAYRTN_APRVL_DATE ,OD_SC_SHARED_FACTORY ,OD_SC_EU_VEND_NO ,OD_SC_EU_FACTORY_NO ,OD_SC_EU_VEND_STATUS FROM Q_od_sc_asia_vendor_master_v WHERE 1=1 AND OD_SC_VENDOR_STATUS = 'Active' AND ('ODASIA' = :P_REGION OR :P_REGION = 'ODGLB') AND OD_SC_AUDTWAIV_APR_D IS NULL UNION SELECT OD_SC_VENDOR_NUMBER ,OD_SC_VENDOR_NAME ,OD_SC_VEND_TYPE ,OD_SC_VENDOR_STATUS ,OD_SC_AUDIT_AGENT ,OD_SC_VEND_CONT_NAME ,OD_SC_VEND_PHONE ,OD_SC_VEND_FAX ,OD_SC_VEND_EMAIL ,OD_SC_VEND_ADDRESS ,OD_SC_FACTORY_NUMBER ,OD_SC_FACTORY_NAME ,OD_SC_FACT_CONT_NAME ,OD_SC_FACTORY_EMAIL ,OD_SC_FACTORY_ADDRESS ,OD_SC_FACTORY_PHONE ,OD_SC_FACTORY_FAX ,OD_SC_EUROPE_RGN ,OD_SC_EU_SUB_RGN ,OD_SC_EU_VEND_STATUS ,OD_SC_MEXICO_REGION ,OD_SC_MX_VEND_NO ,OD_SC_MEX_FACTORY_NO ,OD_SC_MX_VEND_STATUS ,OD_SC_ASIA_REGION ,OD_SC_AS_SUB_RGN ,OD_SC_AS_VEND_NO ,OD_SC_AS_VEND_STATUS ,OD_SC_MERCHANT ,OD_SC_AUDIT_REQUIRED ,OD_SC_AUDIT_WAIVER ,OD_SC_VEND_REGION ,OD_SC_CIP ,OD_SC_FOB_VALUE ,OD_SC_STRAUDT_REQ_D ,OD_SC_PAYMENT_RETAINER ,OD_SC_STR_PAYMENT_APPROVER ,OD_SC_VENDPAY_RCVD_D ,OD_SC_STRAUDT_SCHD_D ,OD_SC_REQ_AUDIT_DATE ,OD_SC_STR_AUDIT_RESULT ,OD_PB_PAYRTN_APRVL_DATE ,OD_SC_SHARED_FACTORY ,OD_SC_EU_VEND_NO ,OD_SC_EU_FACTORY_NO ,OD_SC_EU_VEND_STATUS FROM Q_od_sc_mx_vendor_master_v WHERE 1=1 AND OD_SC_VENDOR_STATUS = 'Active' AND ('ODMX' = :P_REGION OR :P_REGION = 'ODGLB') AND OD_SC_AUDTWAIV_APR_D IS NULL
